snippet.title: Epitasis Official Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Epitasis is a sci-fi puzzle exploration game where you explore the remnants of an ancient alien civilization. Releasing on Steam and Itch.io May 1st, 2019 for PC and Mac. Add it to your wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/662240/Epitasis/

Epitasis will also be releasing for Xbox One and PS4 at a later, unannounced date.

Official Website: http://epitasisgame.com/
Itch Page: https://epitasisgames.itch.io/epitasis
Epitasis Games: https://twitter.com/LucasGovatos/
Funk Fiction: https://open.spotify.com/artist/12Rrb0zhWhcbaXJhVtrmXz
